message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.CY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is the most likely category as the paper deals with secret sharing and security aspects.
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is also likely as the paper discusses the reconstruction of secrets using private shares.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is relevant as the paper mentions the computational efficiency of the scheme.
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is relevant as the paper discusses the complexity of the scheme.
- cs.CY (Computers and Society) is less likely but still possible as the paper mentions the scheme not requiring any secure channel, which could have societal implications.
